item.title: From Bizarre to Sublime at the Barbican
item.author: Jingjie Cheng,Jake A Mossom,
item.description: Tuesday saw the first of three performances by the Los Angeles Philharmonic Orchestra in residency at the Barbican. Dudamel led the players in five pieces (four programmed and then surprisingly an encore, which we don’t see that often with British orchestras) that ranged from novel to bizarre and …
